metadata.name: .RDP File Created By Uncommon Application
metadata.comment: Detects creation of a file with an ".rdp" extension by an application that doesn't commonly create such files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.rdp')) AND (endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\brave.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\ccleaner browser\\\\application\\\\ccleanerbrowser.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\chromium.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\firefox.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\google\\\\chrome\\\\application\\\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\iexplore.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\microsoftedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\opera.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\vivaldi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\whale.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\olk.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\outlook.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\runtimebroker.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\thunderbird.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\discord.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\keybase.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\msteams.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\slack.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\teams.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects creation of a file with an ".rdp" extension by an application that doesn't commonly create such files.
